_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Spacestation 14
author: josdekurk@gmail.com
description: Space Station 14 tells the story of an ordinary shift on a space station gone wrong. Immerse yourself into your role, tinker with detailed systems, and survive the chaos in this round-based multiplayer role playing game.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

apt update
apt -y install curl unzip

V=$(curl -sSL https://central.spacestation14.io/builds/wizards/builds.html | grep "The version is"  | sed -n 's/.*<span class="versionNumber">\([^<]*\)<\/span>.*/\1/p')
ARCH=$([[ "$(uname -m)" == "x86_64" ]] && echo "linux-x64" || echo "linux-arm64")

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

echo "Running: curl -sSL -o server_linux.zip https://cdn.centcomm.spacestation14.com/builds/wizards/builds/${V}/SS14.Server_${ARCH}.zip"
curl -sSL -o server_linux.zip "https://cdn.centcomm.spacestation14.com/builds/wizards/builds/${V}/SS14.Server_${ARCH}.zip"
unzip -o server_linux.zip
rm server_linux.zip

## install end
echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Installation completed..."
echo "-----------------------------------------"

variables.name: Server tickrate
variables.description: The tickrate of the server. Default is 60
